params.baseRatePerYear: The approximate target base APR, as a mantissa (scaled by 1e18)
params.jumpMultiplierPerYear: The multiplierPerSecond after hitting a specified utilization point
params.kink1_: The utilization point at which the interest rate is fixed
params.kink2_: The utilization point at which the jump multiplier is applied
params.multiplierPerYear: The rate of increase in interest rate wrt utilization (scaled by 1e18)
params.owner_: The address of the owner, i.e. the Timelock contract (which has the ability to update parameters directly)
params.roof_: The utilization point at which the borrow rate is fixed

params.borrows: The amount of borrows in the market
params.cash: The amount of cash in the market
params.reserves: The amount of reserves in the market

getBorrowRate(uint256,uint256,uint256).return: The borrow rate percentage per second as a mantissa (scaled by 1e18)

params.borrows: The amount of borrows in the market
params.cash: The amount of cash in the market
params.reserveFactorMantissa: The current reserve factor for the market
params.reserves: The amount of reserves in the market

getSupplyRate(uint256,uint256,uint256,ui.return: The supply rate percentage per second as a mantissa (scaled by 1e18)

params.baseRatePerYear: The approximate target base APR, as a mantissa (scaled by 1e18)
params.jumpMultiplierPerYear: The multiplierPerSecond after hitting a specified utilization point
params.kink1_: The utilization point at which the interest rate is fixed
params.kink2_: The utilization point at which the jump multiplier is applied
params.multiplierPerYear: The rate of increase in interest rate wrt utilization (scaled by 1e18)
params.roof_: The utilization point at which the borrow rate is fixed

params.borrows: The amount of borrows in the market
params.cash: The amount of cash in the market
params.reserves: The amount of reserves in the market (currently unused)

utilizationRate(uint256,uint256,uint256).return: The utilization rate as a mantissa between [0, 1e18]

getBorrowRate(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Calculates the current borrow rate per second, with the error code expected by the market

getSupplyRate(uint256,uint256,uint256,ui.notice: Calculates the current supply rate per second

updateTripleRateModel(uint256,uint256,ui.notice: Update the parameters of the interest rate model (only callable by owner, i.e. Timelock)

utilizationRate(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Calculates the utilization rate of the market: `borrows / (cash + borrows - reserves)`
